revised_title: Exploring the Nature of Electricity and its Effects on Electrics
tldr: The author, William Watson, conducted a series of electrical experiments to understand the nature of electricity. He proposed that electricity is a subtle and elastic fluid present in all bodies on Earth, and its effects are observed when the balance of this fluid is disturbed. The author also explained the phenomenon of snapping and sparks between electrified objects and how they restore balance to the electrical fluid in the objects.
